snippet.title: The Spell Brigade - Official Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Spell Brigade arrives in Early Access on the 16th of September 2024.

The Spell Brigade is an online co-op Survivors-like for 1-4 players. Team up with your wizard friends to slay hordes of dark creatures. Complete team-based objectives, unlock new upgrades and create overpowered spell synergies. Friend nor foe is safe in this friendly fire bullet hell!

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2904000/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=ealaunch&utm_medium=socials&utm_content=link

© 2024 - Bolt Blaster Games
